alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Arthur, northeastern Perkins, eastern Keith, southern Hooker, northwestern Lincoln, McPherson and southwestern Thomas Counties through 600 PM CDT/500 PM MDT/... At 512 PM CDT/412 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles southwest of Mullen to 17 miles east of Arthur to near Kingsley Dam. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ogallala, Tryon, Paxton, Sarben, Keystone, Roscoe, Kingsley Dam, Flatts, Big Lamunyon Flats, Nevens, Broganville, East Cody Lake, Big Bald Hill, Bucktail Lake, Sand Beach Lake, Diamond Bar Lake, Bucktail, Schnick Lake and Shimmons Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 86 and 101. Highway 92 between mile markers 136 and 138, and between mile markers 178 and 209. Highway 97 between mile markers 23 and 52. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 126 and 154. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
